name: analytics-stack
description: Modular analytics SaaS monorepo orchestrating frontend, Umami, and Dub apps.

scripts.dev: concurrently -k -p "[{name}]" -n frontend,umami,dub -c "blue.bold,green.bold,magenta.bold" "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:umami" "npm run dev:dub"
scripts.install:all: npm run install:frontend && npm run install:umami && npm run install:dub
